content.body:
Should it be called an operator? It’s not like it evaluates into an expression by itself—it’s kind of more like spread syntax, right?
“Interpolation syntax”, maybe…
content.formatted_body:
Should it be called an operator? It’s not like it evaluates into an expression by itself—it’s kind of more like spread syntax, right?
“Interpolation syntax”, maybe…

content.body: I’m just thinking about that sentence on the MDN chart of operators that says, “The spread operator is not in this list because it is not an operator,” and wondering if inconsistently saying “interpolation operator” might confuse learners.
